description:
With Algard gone, Anisphia is the only one left to succeed the throne, so she begins acting as a future queen should. Euphyllia makes up her mind to support Anisphia as her assistant and subject, but when she sees the lab all cleaned up and Anisphia forcing herself to smile, her heart wavers...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Succession entre résignation et vive émotion
Teikan to Gekijou no Oui Keishou
The Royal Succession of Resignation and Fury
諦観と激情の王位継承
